Hey Nikole, i really love this kind of videos, just seeing people talking about their food faves i so entertaining 😂 but I have to say one thing, studying food plants engineering i wanted to say that yes refrigerated milk is better on The nutritional side but not because the non-refrigerated one has fillers and preservatives. The nutritional quality and the shelf-life only depend on the heat treatment the product gets. So the refrigerated milk recieves a milder treatment so that the vitamins and proteins don't deteriorate as much as in the non-refrigerated kind of milk that is treated UHT. As a consequence of the milder treatment, the refrigerated milk is more sensible to microorganisms and that's why you keep it in the fridge.
